definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico

sentences.english: Although they are plays on words, the scholars can choose one or two of them.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲遊戲筆墨，但治學者或當有一二可取者耳。

sentences.english: She has the beauty that beggars description.
sentences.chinese: 她的美貌絕非筆墨所能形容。

sentences.english: Even black-white images have different shades of gray, which can be counted as color.
sentences.chinese: 改變的不形式可以是筆墨，也可以是不黑白圖片。

sentences.english: Mr Law struggles a bit to explain why it should be the case.
sentences.chinese: 但是勞先生還是費了些筆墨去解釋這一點。

sentences.english: The beauty of the scenery defies description.
sentences.chinese: 風景秀麗，筆墨也不能形容。

sentences.english: Pen and Ink cover the oriental humanism spirit and aesthetical field at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 而筆墨本身同時也涵蓋着東方的人文精神與審美範疇。

sentences.english: The golden ink symbolized the imperial power draws the outline of the thriving and prosperous era.
sentences.chinese: 象徵皇權的金色筆墨，勾勒出天平盛世的繁華似錦。

sentences.english: Words can hardly describe how excited we were.
sentences.chinese: 我們激動的心情難以用筆墨來形容。

sentences.english: The scenery is beautiful beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的風景美得非筆墨可形容。

sentences.english: This patterned method of painting correlates to the individualistic modes that were common in the late Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 圖案化的筆墨形式，與晚明變形主義頗有契合之處。

sentences.english: The view from the top was quite beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 從山頂看去的景色是筆墨難以形容的。

sentences.english: So I take care of my arms, as you of your pens and your inkhorn .
sentences.chinese: 所以我珍愛我的武器，就像你對待你的筆墨。

sentences.english: Having already exceeded the playing of brushstroke, they entered the creation of brushstroke.
sentences.chinese: 他們早已超出了筆墨的遊戲，而進入了筆墨的創造。

sentences.english: Having already exceeded the playing of brushstroke, they entered the creation of brushstroke.
sentences.chinese: 他們早已超出了筆墨的遊戲，而進入了筆墨的創造。

sentences.english: Beyond learning and teaching, he nurtures his temperament with ink and pen.
sentences.chinese: 治學之餘，以筆墨陶冶性情。

sentences.english: The modern pen and ink already have the very big breakthrough with the pen, the ink and the color aspect.
sentences.chinese: 現代筆墨在用筆用墨用色方面已經有很大的突破。

definition: to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
